name: Squirrel in a nutquest
description:
This is our contribution to the Cozy Autumn Game Jam, it's a simple puzzle game inspired by Pokémon and Lara Croft Go where you are a squirrel in search of the biggest nut, for that you have to solve some puzzles and run away from dogs and birds.

We didn't want complicated puzzles or combat to keep the game cozy and relaxing, the puzzles are simple and your character has room for carrying only one item. The game was made so that even if you fail sometimes, you will quickly get to the answer.
